# Service Cache
Caching service and query interface used in big data environment.

## Requirements
To manipulate Redis with a graphical interface use Redis Desktop Manager.

| Requisite      | Version  |
| -------------- | -------- |
| Docker         | 20.10.12 |
| Docker-compose | 1.26.2   |


## Run
```bash
docker-compose up # -d (deamon)
```

---
